title: Baillargeon research infants do not look at ball

content.prompt: Researcher Renee Baillargeon found that four-month-old infants will look longer at a ball if it appears to roll through a solid barrier, demonstrating that babies seem to grasp basic physical laws intuitively. Which of the following theories does this finding challenge?

choices.label: Mary Ainsworth’s findings from the Strange Situation

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
